sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import {Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg' const Tourdetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() const tour= tourData.find(tour =>tour.id==id) const {photo, title,place, desc, price,address, reviews, distance, maxGroupSize}= tour const {totalRating, avgRating}= calculateAvgRating(reviews) const options ={day:'numeric', month:'long', year:'numeric'} return (

{title}

{address} {calculateAvgRating ===0? null: avgRating} {totalRating===0? 'No Ratings' :({reviews?.length}) }
{place}
â‚¹{price}/per adult
{distance} km {maxGroupSize} people
Description

{desc}

{/*==========Tour review section===============*/}

Reviews({reviews?.length} reviews)

{ reviews?.map(review =>(
Adarsh

{new Date('02-24-2023').toLocaleDateString('en-US', options )}

5
Amazing Place
)) }
{/*==========Tour review section end===============*/}
) } export default Tourdetails
